meanings.sent1: The woodenhead struggled to understand the simple instructions.
meanings.sent2: Don't be a woodenhead and forget your keys at home.
meanings.sent3: The woodenhead thought a tomato was a type of fruit.
meanings.sent4: His stubbornness made him a woodenhead when it came to trying new things.
meanings.sent5: The woodenhead's vacant expression showed his lack of understanding.

meanings.sent1: The teacher sighed at the woodenhead's constant confusion.
meanings.sent2: He was known as the village woodenhead due to his forgetfulness.
meanings.sent3: The woodenhead tried to open the door by pushing instead of pulling.
meanings.sent4: His stubbornness made him a woodenhead when it came to following advice.
meanings.sent5: The woodenhead's vacant stare revealed his lack of comprehension.
